text: Boltonia lautureana is an East Asian species of plants in the sunflower family. It is native to China, Japan, Korea, and Asiatic Russia.Flora of China, 山马兰 shan ma lan, Aster lautureanus (Debeaux) Franchet Boltonia lautureana is a plant up to 100 cm (40 inches) tall. It has many daisy-like flower heads with blue ray florets and yellow disc florets.Debeaux, Jean Odon 1877.
